short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Scout while browsing LinkedIn to find your prospects’ work emails, mobile numbers, and write personalized sales emails with AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scout lets you easily import leads from LinkedIn, find contact information with 99% accuracy, run AI-powered email campaigns, & more - in one place.

Whether you're on your feed, LinkedIn profile, Sales Navigator, or even looking at lists of Group members, likes and comments, you can one-click import anywhere from LinkedIn to grab all accurate contact information, add them to your CRM, or write personalized emails with Scout. 

Unlike most B2B contact databases, we find contact information in real-time, which means saying goodbye to invalid email address and phone numbers. With Scout, our contact information has <1% bounce rate.

If you need help writing cold emails that actually land, Scout has you covered. Most of us have experienced it – you try to let AI write an entire sales email for you and it sounds...bad. Scout is fine-tuned to not sound like a robot, and it only personalizes the portions of the email that actually save you time. 

Scout also integrates with HubSpot, Salesforce, Outreach, Outlook, and more being added every week.

Try it free today, and use your automatically generated referral link to get more free credits!
